channel.title: General Electric Company (R-033)
channel.generator: Function write_rss() in R package nrcadams

item.title: GEH - Submittal of Annual Nuclear Test Reactor (NTR) Operating Report for the Year 2023
item.description: Annual Operating Report, Letter
item.author: GE-Hitachi Nuclear Energy Americas, LLC

item.title: PNO-V-90-017A:on 900406,three earthquakes felt in Walnut Creek area.Earthquakes not felt at GE facility & NTR reactor not operating at time of earthquake.No damage resulted.
item.description: PRELIMINARY NOTIFICATION OF EVENT OR OCCURRENCE (PNO,, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: Generic ltr to all research & test reactor licensees re current status of revised guidance criteria for research & test reactor emergency planning.FR notice published 811231, amends dates & associated power levels for emergency plans.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR REACTOR REGULATION (NRR)

item.title: Forwards IE Info Notice 80-32,Revision 1, "Clarification of Certain Requirements for Exclusive Use Shipments of Radioactive Matls." W/o encl.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO VENDOR/MANUFACTURER, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: Informs that IE Info Notice 81-39, "EPA Crosscheck Program - Low Level Radioiodine in Water Intercomparison Study," has been sent to listed licensees.
item.description: INTERNAL OR EXTERNAL MEMORANDUM, MEMORANDUMS-CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION IV)

item.title: Releases public version of radiological emergency plan.
item.description: INTERNAL OR EXTERNAL MEMORANDUM, MEMORANDUMS-CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF ADMINISTRATION (ADM)

item.title: Forwards public version of radiological emergency plan.Plan addresses both reactor & fuels facilities,per Alternative 3 in modified order to modify License SNM-960.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE, VENDOR/MANUFACTURER TO NRC
item.author: GENERAL ELECTRIC CO.

item.title: PNO-V-90-022:on 900427,earthquake occurred in Northern California.Earthquakes not felt at GE facility & no observable effects to Region V ofc noted.
item.description: PRELIMINARY NOTIFICATION OF EVENT OR OCCURRENCE (PNO,, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: PNO-V-90-019:on 900417,earthquakes measuring 4.6 on Richter Scale measured 3 miles west of Upland,CA.On 900418,three earthquakes occurred in northern California.No visual damage occurred to reactors in area.
item.description: PRELIMINARY NOTIFICATION OF EVENT OR OCCURRENCE (PNO,, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.author: MANUFACTURERS HANOVER TRUST CO.

item.title: Advises that staff reviewed self-guarantee assurance & finds submittal reasonable assurance of funds for decommissioning.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR MATERIAL SAFETY and SAFEGUARDS (NMSS)

item.title: Notification of 900223 meeting w/GE in Rockville,MD to discuss decommissioning at Vallecitos.
item.description: INTERNAL OR EXTERNAL MEMORANDUM, MEMORANDUMS-CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR MATERIAL SAFETY and SAFEGUARDS (NMSS)

item.title: Confirms telecon request re 900223 visit re decommissioning funding requirements & estimated decommissioning cost methodology.

item.author: General Electric Co
